title: Big Star's Bigger Star
overview: Big Star's Bigger Star is the show where you learn more about the celebrities you love but this time it's their parents dishing the dirt!Each week, three of Britain's best-loved stars team up with one of their parents to try to win as much money as possible for a charity of their choice. It's a primetime entertainment show filled with funny celebrity revelations, heart-warming moments and stories that will have our celebrity guests with their heads in their hands!
